name: Smoked Salmon on Cucumber Slices
instructions: Wash and slice the cucumber into 1/4 inch thick rounds.
Spread a small amount of cream cheese on each cucumber slice.
Drizzle lemon juice over the cream cheese.
Top each slice with a piece of smoked salmon.
Garnish with dill and a sprinkle of black pepper.
description: A light and refreshing appetizer featuring smoked salmon on cucumber slices, paired with tangy cream cheese and a hint of lemon. Perfect for a quick, nutritious snack that's high in protein.
additional_notes: For added flavor, you can sprinkle some capers or add a thin slice of avocado on top of the smoked salmon.
